eu.wauz.wauzcore.arcade

Interface ArcadeMinigame

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MinigameDoorDash, MinigameHexAGone, MinigameJinxed, MinigameTemplateBreakingFloor, MinigameThinIce, MinigameTipToe, MinigameVanHelsing, MinigameWallSiege

    public interface ArcadeMinigame
    A minigame playable in the arcade mode.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
